methods.Synopsis:
This method is used to list the cluster workers currently functioning. Its also lists its system info.

Will return the following status codes:

  1. 200: Successful
  2. 400: Validation Errors
  3. 401: Authentication Failure
  4. 500: Server Error

parameters.Name: skip
parameters.Description: For Pagination. How many records to skip.

parameters.Name: limit
parameters.Description: For Pagination. How many records to fetch. '-1' means infinite.
